info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-switchport-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions for
     monitoring switchport information.
     Copyright (c) 2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Interfaces & Layer 2
**Paths:** 5

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-switchport-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-switchport-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-switchport-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-switchport-oper.html)

get.description: This is the top level container for switchport operational data.
Switchport operational information of the interface. (collection)
Switchport operational information of the interface.
Switchport operational information of the interface. (collection)
Switchport operational information of the interface.

start-id.description: Starting VLAN ID. May be the same as end-id.

end-id.description: Ending VLAN ID. May be the same as start-id.

oper-mode.description: Operational switchport mode, showing the actual status of the interface after negotiation.

agport-if-name.description: If the interface is in an aggregate port bundle, the bundle name.

is-agport-suspend.description: If the interface is in an aggregate port bundle, displays if the port bundle is suspended.

access-mode-id.description: The VLAN ID of the access mode VLAN.

access-mode-name.description: The name of the access mode VLAN.

access-state.description: The current operational state of the access mode VLAN.

trunk-nat-mode-id.description: The VLAN ID of the trunking native mode VLAN.

trunk-nat-mode-name.description: The name of the trunking native mode VLAN.

trunk-nat-state.description: The current operational state of the trunking native mode VLAN.

voice-id.description: The VLAN ID of the voice VLAN.

voice-name.description: The name of the voice VLAN.

voice-state.description: The current operational state of the voice VLAN.

enabled.description: Port is in switchport when enabled. Otherwise, it is in routed mode.

hardware-present.description: The Field Replaceable Unit, or hardware module, is present.
